snippet: Archbishop Desmond M. Tutu wrote that the two former leaders should be made to “answer for their actions” in the 2003 invasion of Iraq.
abstract: Nobel laureate Desmond M Tutu calls for former President George W Bush and former Prime Minister Tony Blair of Britain to face prosecution at the International Criminal Court for their role in the 2003 invasion of Iraq.
lead_paragraph: Archbishop Desmond M. Tutu wrote that the two former leaders should be made to “answer for their actions” in the 2003 invasion of Iraq.

headline.seo: Tutu Says Bush and Blair Should Face Court Over Iraq
headline.main: Tutu Calls for Trial of Bush and Blair
headline.print_headline: Tutu Calls for Trial Of Bush and Blair

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
